required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Study of JS108 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label, First-in-human, Dose Escalation and Expansion Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic Profile of Recombinant Humanized Anti-Trop2 mAb-Tub196 Conjugate in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I, open-label, first-in-human clinical study designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability, PK profile and efficacy of JS108 for patients with advanced solid tumors. This study is divided into 3 periods: dose escalation period, dose expansion period, and clinical expansion period.

primary_outcome.measure: First Cycle Dose Limiting Toxicities (DLTs) In Order to Determine the Maximum Tolerated Dose(MTD)
primary_outcome.time_frame: A minimum of 21 days after first infusion of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants that experienced dose limiting toxicities(DLTs) at given dose level.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: The adverse events will be evaluated in accordance with CTCAE v5.0. The investigator shall assess the relationship between the events and investigational product.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed serum or plasma concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum or plasma concentration time curve from 0 to infinity (AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of distribution at steady state (Vss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: One of the pharmacokinetics parameters for JS108

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the immunogenicity of JS108 in patients with advanced solid tumors

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: As determined by the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) Version 1.1, which will be complete response (CR) + partial response (PR)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: DOR is defined as the time from the date of the first documentation of response (confirmed CR or confirmed PR) to the date of the first documentation of PD or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the time from the date of randomization to the earlier of the dates of the first documentation of progressive disease or death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: OS is defined as the time from the date of randomization to the date of death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Levels of Trop2 (trophoblast antigen 2) expression in tumor tissue
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate any potential correlations of Trop2 levels with responses and toxicity

intervention.intervention_name: JS108 (recombinant humanized anti-Trop2 mAb-Tub196 conjugate for injection)
intervention.description: Dose escalation period: JS108 is administered intravenously every three weeks (Q3W) at the dose corresponding to the enrolled dose cohort. Dose expansion period: JS108 is administered intravenously Q3W at the corresponding dose. Clinical expansion period: JS108 is administered intravenously Q3W at the recommended dose.
